fixes.name: YTD Value - Up
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau IF expression to DAX IF. Referenced the calculated field using table-qualified column syntax ('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[YTD Value - YoY]) and preserved string literals with double quotes.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references the aggregated/calculated field 'YTD Value - YoY' (an aggregation/measure), therefore it must be implemented as a measure in Power BI.
